    • setPublicID

      public static void setPublicID(Object gwObject, String publicId) throws ReflectionException
      This sets the publicID for the gwObject. Since gwObjects maybe be used to create an actual entity, the rules for entities should be followed -- This value should not be changed once exposed externally; This value must be unique; This value should not leak information. This value will be created on commit if not set manually. The default method is random for security reasons. If you manually set the value here, you should ensure that it is similarly secure and unique.
      Parameters:
      gwObject - this should be an object that has a publicID property
      publicId - the value to be set as the public id of this entity.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException

    • getPublicID
